code: @Test @OperateOnDeployment("multiple-locations") public void resolvePropertyFromLocations(CamelContext context) throws Exception {     assertThat("Property from classpath locations does not resolve!", context.resolvePropertyPlaceholders("{{foo.property}}"), is(equalTo("foo.value"))).     assertThat("Property from classpath locations does not resolve!", context.resolvePropertyPlaceholders("{{bar.property}}"), is(equalTo("bar.value"))). }
